General.Name: First Mining Gold Corp
General.Description: First Mining Gold Corp. develops and explores for gold projects. It also explores for silver and copper deposits. The company primarily holds interests in the Springpole Gold Project located in northwestern Ontario. First Mining Gold Corp. was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1188 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A2
